extensionDescription.message: Allows to email link URL address from its context menu.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension displayed in the add-ons manager.

emailLinkContextMenu.description: Text for the context menu item. Should be the same as is Firefox https://transvision.mozfr.org/string/?entity=browser/chrome/browser/customizableui/customizableWidgets.properties:email-link-button.label&repo=central
